items.name: Dagger
items.desc: A small, sharp blade, perfect for quick and deadly strikes.

items.name: Shield
items.desc: A sturdy shield offering excellent protection in combat.

items.name: Cap
items.desc: A simple cap that offers minimal protection to the head.

items.name: Gloves
items.desc: A pair of gloves that improve grip and provide some defense.

items.name: Cape
items.desc: A flowing cape that offers protection and a touch of style.

items.name: Pants
items.desc: A pair of durable pants providing basic leg protection.

items.name: Boots
items.desc: A sturdy pair of boots that offer good foot protection and comfort.

items.name: Potion
items.desc: A magic potion that heals some hp.

items.name: TeleportRune
items.desc: A rune for a teleportation spell.

items.name: Rune
items.desc: A rune that can cast magic.

items.name: Scroll
items.desc: A scroll that can cast magic.
